Poliglot, Me? https://brunogrossi.com/tech/polyglot-me/ Mon, 31 Aug 2020 21:06:43 -0300 Author https://brunogrossi.com/tech/polyglot-me/ Polyglot, me? — Bruno E. Grossi I’m studying English again but serious now. Although I studied English when was young and have already worked with teams abroad, my current job as a Software Architect at Ci&T is the first one where I really need English. And the company is actually helping me intending to be fluent in English. But I need to confess: it’s a painful process for me, as I don’t like English.
